author: Fair_Instance_8065
comment: for me in cen in 1.1 they forced us to get the physical notes but they are HEAVY so i really recommend getting a tablet to access the notes as its more convenient. pretty sure you are able to download lockdown browser on the tablets too to do icqs so yeah a tablet wld be a good choice.
